articles.title: Islam vs Ilia? Do It at 170. #ufc
articles.description: Chael Sonnen says it straight: Khabib‚Äôs wrong on this one. When it comes to Islam Makhachev vs. Ilia Topuria, everyone‚Äôs asking the wrong question ‚Äî it‚Äôs not if they fight, it‚Äôs where. The debate over whether Ilia should drop to 155 misses the whole point. Chael lays it out clearly: if they do this fight at 170 pounds, you open the door to something historic ‚Äî the chance for Ilia Topuria to become the first-ever three-division champion. That‚Äôs the story. That‚Äôs the headline. But Team Khabib, according to Chael, is too focused on protecting Islam instead of chasing legacy. This is classic Chael analysis ‚Äî bold, strategic, and grounded in the real fight business. Forget what‚Äôs ‚Äúbest for your guy.‚Äù The right move is what gets the fight, what grows the brand, what captures history. Islam vs. Ilia at 170 isn‚Äôt just a matchup ‚Äî it‚Äôs an event that changes divisions, rankings, and pay-per-views overnight. üëâ Watch more of Chael‚Äôs unfiltered takes and stay ahead of MMA‚Äôs power moves.

articles.title: Striker vs Grappler: The Game Has Changed #ufc
articles.description: The old rule said grapplers always win. But that rule‚Äôs starting to crack ‚Äî and in this clip, Chael Sonnen breaks down why. From Jose Aldo and Israel Adesanya to Alex Pereira, the script has flipped. The striker-versus-grappler battle isn‚Äôt what it used to be, and history‚Äôs starting to argue back. Chael dives into the upcoming matchup between Islam Makhachev and Jack Hermansson, dissecting why this fight isn‚Äôt as predictable as people think. Jack didn‚Äôt chase this fight ‚Äî he was forced into it. Meanwhile, Islam chose to move up for this exact opponent. That alone tells you something. It tells Chael everything. This isn‚Äôt just about styles ‚Äî it‚Äôs about strategy, psychology, and what fighters know behind the scenes. When Chael says, ‚Äúthese guys already know who‚Äôs going to win,‚Äù you better believe there‚Äôs meaning behind it. And when he mentions ‚Äúthe curse,‚Äù you know he‚Äôs about to stir the pot. Stick around, because this one changes how we look at MMA history ‚Äî and who really controls the fight game. üëâ Watch more breakdowns from Chael and stay sharp.
